*description*: *Steve Rogers finds the last change agent
*url*: someone who can change the direction of the world forever...by dying. And as Steve wrestles with the morality of his task
*thumbnail*: a member of his inner circle is moving to betray him... PLUS: PART 2 OF DEADPOOL/WOLVERINE: WEAPON X-TRACTION!*

*description*: *IN TOO DEEP! WOLVERINE and NIGHTGUARD have made it to the heart of the vampire base. But if they can fight through the aquatic AQUEOS VAMPIRES
*url*: what untold horrors await in the caverns above?! Tom Waltz's debut Marvel series continues as he and Juan José Ryp bring LOGAN on his long journey into darkness…against OLD FRIENDS and NEW ENEMIES!*

*description*: *OUT OF THE OUTBACK ON A LIFE-AND-DEATH MISSION! At last - LOGAN's secret adventure revealed! Featuring a sinister revelation and claw-to-claw confrontations with SABRETOOTH
*url*: this is a must-have WOLVERINE story for new and long-standing fans alike that simply cannot be missed! Back in UNCANNY X-MEN #246
*thumbnail*: Logan set off from the Australian outback
*year*: leaving behind what was left of the X-MEN
column9: Chris Claremont reveals just what Wolverine got up to before his classic battle with the REAVERS! The next Chris Claremont-penned mutant saga begins
column10: with the untold story of Wolverine's most personal mission!*

*description*: *LOGAN'S LIFE STORY - IN CHRONOLOGICAL ORDER FOR THE FIRST TIME! WOLVERINE has been mindwiped
*url*: manipulated and given false memories so many times
*thumbnail*: what is the truth of his long life? Now
*year*: as a journey into his own past becomes paramount to the survival of mutantkind
column7: delve into the TRUE story of LOGAN's life
column8: from his earliest days in the late 1800s
column9: to the many wars he's fought alongside comrades like CAPTAIN AMERICA and SABRETOOTH
column10: to the WEAPON X procedures that changed his life forever
column11: his days on the X-MEN and more! All IN CONTINUITY
column12: this includes some adventures and links to the past never before revealed
column13: giving the most complete picture of WOLVERINE's history EVER ASSEMBLED!  In print for the first time!*

*description*: *THE HELLFIRE WARRIORS UNLEASHED! PROJECT HELLFIRE has unleashed their HELLFIRE-FUELED WARRIORS!  But as HELLVERINE comes into conflict with this renegade team of reanimated fighters
*url*: will LOGAN be able to quell their violent mission
*thumbnail*: or will the clash result in hell on Earth?*

*description*: *INTO THE HEART OF MADRIPOOR'S DARKNESS - FOR THE LAST TIME! THE HAND has finally enacted their decades-long plan for NATASHA ROMANOFF!  With the BLACK WIDOW meeting her destiny (as teased in UNCANNY X-MEN #268!!!)
*url*: will WOLVERINE and CAPTAIN AMERICA be able to save her or succumb to dark forces as this trio team up for the LAST TIME? Chris Claremont's all-new
*thumbnail*: in-continuity adventure concludes with the culmination of his story over thirty years in the making!*

*description*: *FIGHTING FANGS WITH FANGS! WOLVERINE is up to his claws in vampires
*url*: but luckily he gets a little help from his friends! LOUISE
*thumbnail*: the vampire-hunting vampire of the NIGHTGUARD
*year*: and LOGAN cut their way through vamps to bring the fight to their leader - and you'll NEVER GUESS who it is!  But can Louise control her vampiric tendencies to save the day
column7: or is every step closer to their enemy a step closer to disaster?*

*description*: *SURVIVAL OF THE FITTEST! WOLVERINE and DEADPOOL
*thumbnail*: with no hope of survival - except each other!  If they can fight off the ENHANCED FORCES of THOSE WHO WATCH
*year*: only one battle remains - LOGAN VS. WADE WILSON!  And it can only end - IN DEATH! You'll have to read it to believe it!  And: The story behind the DELTA revealed!*

*description*: *LOGAN FIGHTS BACK THE DARKNESS! WOLVERINE's the best there is at what he does - and today
*url*: fighting vampires is going to have to top that list!  Don't miss the MARVEL DEBUT of scintillating scribe TOM WALTZ (Teenage Mutant Ninja Turtles
*thumbnail*: The Last Ronin) as he teams up with daring artistic dynamo JUAN JOSÉ  RYP (WOLVERINE
*year*: VENGEANCE OF THE MOON KNIGHT) for a bloody good time! As the sky darkens across the globe and vampires reign
column7: what hidden plot puts LOGAN directly in their crosshairs? Hint: It's like nothing you've seen in BLOOD HUNT yet!  Be here as the plot (and blood!) thickens when a secret vampire sect enacts a startling strategy that'll take Logan - and the world - to the brink!  Guest-starring some SURPRISE characters from Wolverine's past!*

*description*: *CREED VS. LOGAN - THE FINAL SHOWDOWN! It's all come down to this: the final battle between WOLVERINE and SABRETOOTH.  The Sabretooth War concludes in the way it began - a violent
*url*: bloody battle - but WHO will be left standing? Plus: Special short stories celebrating fifty issues of this run and 50 YEARS OF WOLVERINE
*thumbnail*: from legendary Logan scribes including Larry Hama
*year*: as well as a final send-off from Benjamin Percy and Javi Fernández

*description*: *RIDE TO HELL AND BACK IN HELLVERINE'S FIRST EVER SOLO SERIES! Because you demanded it - the return of the HELLVERINE!  When a DEMONIC FORCE known as BAGRA-GHUL first came to earth
*url*: it brought LOGAN and GHOST RIDER together to hunt it before it possessed WOLVERINE. But now
*year*: what event will put the Hellverine back on the streets…and is he slashing his hellfire claws for good or evil? And
column7: introducing the ALL-NEW HELLFIRE WARRIORS! Don't miss the launch of the all-new series
column8: brought to you by Hellverine co-creator Benjamin Percy (WOLVERINE
column9: GHOST RIDER) and blazing hot talent Julius Ohta (ALIEN

*description*: *THE HAND'S DIABOLICAL PLAN - AND THEIR FIERCEST WARRIOR! WOLVERINE and CAPTAIN AMERICA race to defeat the HAND's ULTIMATE WARRIOR!  But a much darker fate awaits the BLACK WIDOW if this heroic trio can't stop MATSU'O and the Hand's decades-long plan! Plus: MEET the SAIKO-JONIN and discover how they will alter our heroes' destinies! X-Men Legend Chris Claremont's all-new
*ARMOR UP FOR THE PENULTIMATE PART OF SABRETOOTH WAR! WOLVERINE is powerless - but not defenseless.  FORGE made LOGAN one last invention
*url*: and with the lives of the X-MEN and all mutants on the line
*thumbnail*: it's time to unleash the ultimate weapon! COLLECTORS' NOTE: Featuring the full debut of the Adamantium Armor!*

*description*: *WADE WILSON AND LOGAN AT THE ENDS OF THE EARTH - AND EACH OTHER'S THROATS! The most intensely mismatched team-up in comics and pop culture - the best there is and the merc with the mouth - undergoes a radical change as we kick off a three-part
*url*: globe-spanning saga for the ages! The mysterious DELTA believes in change. Change is good.  But as he sets his sights on DEADPOOL
*thumbnail*: and WOLVERINE is caught up in the plot
*year*: is the third time really the charm
column7: or the curse? Get ready for WWIII to erupt on the scene with the wildest duo in comics from legends Joe Kelly (DEADPOOL

*description*: *CREED VS. CREED! - SABRETOOTH WAR - PART 8! It's a family affair as GRAYDON CREED
*url*: the maligned son of VICTOR CREED
*year*: brings the fight to his father. The winner gets WOLVERINE - or…what's left of him…!*

*description*: *CAPTAIN AMERICA must secure a deadly weapon in Madripoor with the help of WOLVERINE and BLACK WIDOW
*url*: and before it hits the auction block
*thumbnail*: our titanic trio takes a different tactic - subterfuge! But can even the highly trained Black Widow outmaneuver the PRINCE of Madripoor and the HAND before the weapon is unleashed?  And what - or WHO - will cause WOLVERINE to unsheathe his claws once more? The long-awaited follow-up to Chris Claremont's legendary adventure continues with the most electrifying chapter yet!*

*description*: *ONE HAPPY WOLVERINE! Across almost every universe in existence
*thumbnail*: by the sins of his past and his future. But ione world - the very one that Onslaught has targeted next for annihilation - has a Wolverine unlike any other. A Wolverine…who got what he wanted. And for the Logan from Earth-X? That news just might be the claw in the coffin. The Phoenix's handpicked Band of Logans go to war!*

*description*: *SAVAGE ESCAPE! - SABRETOOTH WAR - PART 7! LAURA KINNEY must escape the clutches of the SAVAGE SABRETOOTH! Will VICTOR CREED'S WEAPON spell the end for LOGAN?  A can't-miss issue!*
*BRAIN CHANGER/GAME CHANGER! - SABRETOOTH WAR PART 6! WOLVERINE's memory has been altered
column7: if he can't get his head on straight
column8: SABRETOOTH will do far worse than that! The most diabolical chapter of SABRETOOTH WAR yet…and you thought those early issues were violent?!*

*description*: *THE FINAL BATTLE AGAINST BEAST IN THE LANDMARK 50th ISSUE! X-FORCE confronts BEAST with their secret weapon. A final reckoning. Not a dry eye in the house. TARGET: BEAST finale!*

*THE WOLF IS AT THE DOOR! The pulse-pounding DAREDEVIL saga from Saladin Ahmed and Aaron Kuder continues - as whatever mysterious force that has made Matt Murdock's life a living hell for weeks has now put him and his fearless alter ego DAREDEVIL on a collision course with the one and only WOLVERINE!*

*title*: *Wolverine by Claremont and Buscema Facsimile Edition (2024) #1*
*description*: *The debut issue of Wolverine's first-ever
*url*: long-running ongoing series! Chris Claremont teams with comic-book giant John Buscema to send Logan on a sword quest - fighting pirates in Indonesia! From there
*year*: where a cult seeks the black blade known as the Muramasa Sword. Whether wearing his stripped-down black suit and no mask or donning his signature "Patch" disguise
column7: this is a Wolverine unlike anything ever seen before - slicing and dicing armies of pirates and cultists! It's one of the all-time great Marvel comic books
column8: boldly re-presented in its original form

*description*: *MELEE IN MADRIPOOR AS ROUGHOUSE AND BLOODSCREAM RETURN! WOLVERINE
*url*: CAPTAIN AMERICA and BLACK WIDOW delve deeper into the mystery of the missing weapon in Madripoor and come face-to-face with Logan's old enemies
*thumbnail*: ROUGHOUSE and BLOODSCREAM! If Bloodscream gets his hands on any of these heroes
*year*: neither a mutant nor a Super-Soldier will make it through unscathed! And what mysterious ALLY holds the key to victory…if our heroes can save them in time?! The untold sequel to UNCANNY X-MEN #268 continues with shocking revelations of a mission you only thought you knew…*

*description*: *THE END HAS TRULY BEGUN! The X-Men have taken all they're willing to take from Orchis… Now it's time for them to do the dishing out. Unfortunately
*url*: just when it seems like one threat is over…another rises to take its place. The final battle of the Krakoan age rages as two series that are one move toward a crash that will echo across the universe…*

*description*: *X MARKS THE SPOT! - SABRETOOTH WAR - PART 5! The treasure hunt is on as SABRETOOTH picks up on the trail of an item that will turn the tide in the war on WOLVERINE! But as the best there is regroups with the remnants of his allies
*url*: it'll be a race against time for the good guys to uncover a LOST weapon that could prove to be their LAST HOPE! And that's if ORCHIS and the STARK SENTINELS don't get them first!*

*description*: *THEY'RE THE BEST THERE IS AT WHAT THEY DO! And what they do is eat the hell out of your brain before slicing you to ribbons with six adamantium claws!  WOLVERINE! VENOM! 'Nuff said!*
*A MULTIVERSE OF LOGANS BANDS TOGETHER! In Original X-Men
*url*: you saw the Phoenix recruit the young X-Men to fix yet another time-displaced disaster. But now the threat is deadlier than ever…and it's time to call in the X-Men's big gun. He's the best there is at what he does
*thumbnail*: in every universe does it in...and this job is too big for just one of him. Wolverines from across the Multiverse converge to take on a foe even the Phoenix fears! But with friends like Zombie Wolverine
*year*: who needs enemies? Christos Gage and Yildiray Çinar kick off an action-packed epic!*

*description*: *SABRETOOTH WAR - PART 4! Death has followed LOGAN for over a century. But as the blood pools and the gravestones pile up around him
*url*: what happens when SABRETOOTH kills again? The fallout of significant mutant deaths
*thumbnail*: and a desperate tactical play by WOLVERINE and X-FORCE turns the SABRETOOTH WAR on its head!*

*description*: *Relive comics history in the making as Wolverine's hidden past with Captain America and the Black Widow is revealed
*url*: courtesy of superstar creators Chris Claremont and Jim Lee! It's one of the all-time great Marvel comic books
*thumbnail*: boldly re-presented in its original form
*year*: ads and all! Reprinting UNCANNY X-MEN #268.*

*description*: *SABRETOOTH WAR - PART 3! SABRETOOTH and WOLVERINE once worked together - and killed together! But how do the violent missions of their TEAM X days factor into the SABRETOOTH WAR being waged in the present?*
*THE ULTIMATE MUTANT HUNTER! The X-Men lived in fear of Nimrod's creation
*url*: and now it's clear why! The ultimate weapon of mutant extinction is ever-adapting
*year*: with only one goal - DEATH TO MUTANTKIND!*

*description*: *Return to the island-nation of Madripoor as X-Men legend Chris Claremont takes the helm of an all-new WOLVERINE tale teaming Logan with his long-standing friends CAPTAIN AMERICA and the BLACK WIDOW! Picking up in the window of the all-time classic UNCANNY X-MEN #268
*url*: thrill to a brand-new adventure! When a secret weapon brings Captain America to Madripoor
*thumbnail*: the trio team-up you've been waiting decades for will finally come to pass as the mission brings Logan and Black Widow into a race against time against a multitude of foes
*year*: including the HAND! You've been waiting for this one…and you'll never guess where it goes!*

*description*: *SABRETOOTH WAR - PART 2! VICTOR CREED and the SABRETEETH have big plans for LOGAN. See the war escalate under the claws of the many Creeds!*
*THE FIGHT FOR KRAKOA HAS BEEN LOST! Ten years ago
*url*: the mutants returned from their exile to try and reclaim the Earth from the forces of Orchis. They failed.  Now
*thumbnail*: within the victorious Orchis with their gauntlet choking the world
*year*: Nimrod and Omega Sentinel put their plan within a plan into action. They are to summon their binary god to consume everything in their accession. All that stands between them is the X-Men. What can they do? They're the X-Men. They'll find a way. That's their power. So begins a story beyond time and space
column7: with the rise of powers beyond our petty human intelligence. From writer Kieron Gillen (IMMORTAL X-MEN
column8: UNCANNY X-MEN) and artist R.B. Silva (POWERS OF X
column9: CAPTAIN AMERICA: SYMBOL OF TRUTH) comes half of the story that will bring the Krakoa Age to its conclusion!*

*description*: *SABRETOOTH WAR BEGINS HERE! THE MOST VIOLENT WOLVERINE STORY EVER TOLD! Get ready for the showdown to end all showdowns – WOLVERINE VS. SABRETOOTH! It’s been years since these heavy hitters have crossed paths in the Marvel Universe
*thumbnail*: so rises SABRETOOTH – and he’s out for revenge! They threw VICTOR CREED in the PIT
column8: will prove once and for all why he is LOGAN’s ultimate nemesis. Co-written by literary powerhouses Benjamin Percy (WOLVERINE
column9: GHOST RIDER) and Victor LaValle (The Changeling
column10: SABRETOOTH) and drawn by artistic dynamos Cory Smith (CONAN
column11: GHOST RIDER) and Geoff Shaw (WEAPONS OF VENGEANCE
column13: don’t miss the inaugural issue in this multi-shipping saga leading up to the landmark issue #50!*

*description*: *X-FORCE: RELOADED! A SPECIAL ISSUE! X-FORCE REBORN! In the aftermath of COLOSSUS' and BEAST's revelations
*url*: X-Force must regroup. And before they tackle their next mission - they must marshal their forces at a new base at the ends of the world! But if the harsh arctic environment won't do them in…perhaps ORCHIS will! Plus: Be here for QUENTIN QUIRE's surprise discovery from the HELLFIRE GALA!*

*description*: *STARK SENTINELS GET SPIDER-SENSES TINGLING! LAST MUTANT STANDING - FINALE! LOGAN's journey across the ORCHIS-controlled globe brings him to New York City - and a reunion with that great non-mutant super hero: SPIDER-MAN! But will the ol' PARKER LUCK help WOLVERINE against the wrath of the STARK SENTINELS or put the fall in FALL OF X?!*
*Collects Ghost Rider/Wolverine: Weapons of Vengeance Alpha (2023) #1
*year*: Ghost Rider/Wolverine: Weapons of Vengeance Omega (2023) #1.  Are you ready for…the Hellverine?! Wolverine is the best there is at what he does - and what he does famously isn't very nice. When innocent blood is spilled
column7: Johnny Blaze becomes the Ghost Rider
column8: equipped to deal out punishment with the power of hellfire! And when a demonic serial killer murders innocent mutants
column9: this deadly new villain brings these two forces of nature together! But what buried secret does this mysterious enemy share with Wolverine and Ghost Rider's never-before-seen first meeting in the past? Get ready for claws
column10: chains and violence as only Benjamin Percy (WOLVERINE
column12: GUARDIANS OF THE GALAXY) can deliver!*

*description*: *TIME TO BLEED! The most gruesome chapter yet! Years after his first encounter with the Yautja
*url*: Wolverine's gone feral - just the way the Weapon X program likes him! If the Predator thought the mutant was hard to kill before…now he'll meet the real beast. But the prize this time isn't just the kill. Now Wolverine carries something precious within him
*thumbnail*: something a Predator's never encountered. An indestructible metal that would give the hunter the edge over prey on any world…*

*description*: *CLAWS IN WAKANDA! WOLVERINE has gone underground to dodge the heat from ORCHIS' mutant hunt
*url*: while BLACK PANTHER is in exile on the outskirts of WAKANDA. But when an illegal cache of precious metals is targeted to further Orchis' agenda
*thumbnail*: these clawed compatriots will team up to keep the goods out of the bad guys' hands! But can even these two heroes protect the innocents caught in the crossfire? LAST MUTANT STANDING continues!*

*description*: *Re-presenting one of the most important and influential X-Men tales ever told! In a post-apocalyptic future
*url*: the mutant-hunting killing machines known as the Sentinels rule America with an iron fist. Almost all mutants
*thumbnail*: super heroes and super villains have been exterminated. Only a handful remain to fight against their oppressive robotic overseers. Now Kate Pryde must travel back in time to warn the X-Men of the coming danger - and hopefully prevent this horrible future from ever taking place! In "Days of Future Past
*year*:
the shocking culmination of their acclaimed, industry-changing X-MEN run, Chris Claremont and John Byrne changed everything for mutantkind - in both its present and its future! In the uncanny X-Verse, he's the best there is at what he does! Join Wolverine on his wildest adventures! When Professor X tasks Logan with taking new student Kitty Pryde under his wing, neither of them is happy about the arrangement - but they'll need to work together to survive the experience! But does Wolverine's future lie with the X-Men? Or back with his old team, Alpha Flight? Why is he going undercover wearing an eyepatch?! And shouldn't Logan be teaching Kitty valuable lessons, rather than trying to take her apart? *110307*,*Predator Vs. Wolverine (2023) #1*,*THE THRILL IS THE KILL! The bloodthirsty saga you've been waiting for! Wolverine has lived one of the longest and most storied lives in Marvel Comics history. Now witness the untold greatest battles of Logan's life - against a Predator! One Yautja seeks the greatest prey in existence - and finds it in Weapon X. From the blood-ridden snows of the Canadian wilderness to the sword-slinging streets of Madripor, Wolverine and a Predator break everything in their paths on their way to the ultimate victory…or glorious death. Superstar writer Benjamin Percy brings the bloodiest hunters in all pop culture to their knees!*,*http://marvel.com/comics/issue/110307/predator_vs_wolverine_2023_1?utm_campaign=apiRef&utm_source=818dad62b16c153f47f723d32982e787*,*http://i.annihil.us/u/prod/marvel/i/mg/9/b0/65299080beddd.jpg*,*2023*

And WOLVERINE hunts down his remaining THREE CLONES from BEAST's WEAPONS OF X, for in the end, there can be only one Logan! *thumbnail*: he'll need to build himself back up
*year*: get better and stronger than he's ever been?but it's not as easy as he thought
column7: and he'll soon find himself turning to other means of revenge when the normal channels don't seem to be working fast enough. Can he fight back his demons
column8: or is this the beginning of a Wolverine who's gone to the dark side?*

*description*: *INHUMANITY TIE-IN! While tracking the toxic Dr. Covington
*url*: the education of SPIDER-GIRL takes a horrific turn: she must hero under the tutelage of the THE CURMUDGEONLY AVENGER: WOLVERINE! The INHUMAN that the AVENGERS seek has unique ability--one that
*year*: could change everything! WARREN ELLIS (AVENGERS: ENDLESS WARTIME) once again joins KELLY SUE DECONNICK (CAPTAIN MARVEL) in a delightfully demented dance through the Avengers roster.*

*description*: *"THE BOOTLEGGER." SURVIVING THE BLACK ROLLERS! In the 1930s Dustbowl
*url*: Logan is a bootlegger carrying whiskey down from Canada
*thumbnail*: until he finds himself the accidental caretaker of a group of orphans whose family was targeted by the mob. Now Logan must choose between the anonymous life he's been meticulously building or stepping out into the spotlight again to defend the innocent. A tale of family
*year*: betrayal and revenge all set against the hard-scrabble life of the Great Depression
column7: this is a chapter of Wolverine's life you won't want to miss!*

*description*: *IT ALL ENDS HERE! THE FINAL CHAPTER OF KILLABLE! Logan's last stand against Sabretooth. The Microverse virus offers Logan a trade: his healing factor for his help in evading S.H.I.E.L.D.--can he afford to say no?*
*Part 2 of 2! Wolverine's hunt leads him to Madripoor
*url*: where he makes a shocking discovery. Guest-starring Kitty Pryde.*

*description*: *INHUMANITY TIE-IN. Spider-Woman and the Hulk -- Team Sad! -- are Back in Black...and red. And yellow. And purple and green. A lot of green. Speaking of green - Spider-Girl follows in the footsteps of her investigative reporter Dad and follows the money. The Toxic Doxie has her very own Inhuman...All that a homicidal maniac could ask for.*
*The penultimate chapter of KILLABLE
*url*: the storyline that will change Wolverine as we know him forever! Wolverine is confronted with the mastermind behind the bounty on his head. Meanwhile
*thumbnail*: the virus is in its final stages of a hostile takeover of the human race!*

*description*: *An all new arc by superstar Phil Jimenez! (NEW X-MEN
*thumbnail*: Wonder Woman). On an annual safari in the African veldt
*year*: Wolverine encounters a killer that will take him halfway across the world. Wolverine returns to Madripoor to deal with some family business.*

*description*: *With the world on the brink of viral apocalypse
*url*: Logan and Kitty Pryde face down the Thirteen Ninjas of Sabretooth's Hand! And that's not all - enter Lord Deathstrike and the Silver Samurai! It all comes to a head with one final moment that will change the face of Wolverine - forever!*

*description*: *Jock's sci-fi Wolverine saga comes to its thrilling conclusion! Logan learns the sinister truth of the alien planet he's found himself on. But more horrifying still are the truths he finds in an underground cavern - truths he may not be prepared to learn! Everything comes full circle as Logan's future finds its roots in the darkest corners of his past!*
*Part 2 of a futuristic sci-fi Wolverine adventure from fan-favorite writer/artist Jock! Logan has managed to survive so far on the alien planet he's been forced to call home. But now
*url*: a mysterious child has arrived on the planet with a single-minded mission - to kill Wolverine! When the truth of the child's past - and its connections to Logan's own - is revealed
*thumbnail*: Logan will have more than mere survival on his mind!*

*description*: *PART 3 OF KILLABLE! Who says you can't go home? Logan and Kitty's road trip heads north - to the grounds of the former Howlett estate! But more than bittersweet memories are waiting for Logan in the place he once called home. The ghosts of Logan's Canadian childhood meet the demons of his adulthood as he continues to grapple with his new reality!*
*The Good
*thumbnail*: part 4 of 5. Deadpool's past has been weaponized! Three Weapon Plus alumni unite to take it down!*

*description*: *BATTLE OF THE ATOM PART 7 Chaos at the Jean Grey School as the X-Men and Future X-Men are attacked! Rachel Grey is the only X-Man qualified to defeat the mystery opponents!*
*FINAL ISSUE! Through thick and thin
*thumbnail*: the X-Men have always stood together as a family. Is there anything in this world - or any other - that could break them up? It all ends here as Marjorie Liu bids a fond farewell to the Astonishing team!*

*description*: *A new arc begins here as New York Times Best-Selling artist JOCK spins a tale of science fiction intrigue in a far-flung future! When Wolverine crash-lands on an alien planet
*url*: he'll need more than just his healing factor to survive! But even if he adapts to this strange environment and its stranger denizens
*thumbnail*: will Logan be able to handle the secrets the planet hides? Extraterrestrial excitement hits close to home in a Wolverine tale like none you've seen before!*

*description*: *THE GOOD
*url*: THE BAD & THE UGLY parts 2 & 3! In the heart of the enemy's clutches
*thumbnail*: Deadpool meets some uncanny friends...Captain America & Wolverine get sucked into the mystery of Deadpool's past.*

*description*: *Wolverine and Elektra in a climactic battle against the Kingpin! Who will win? Who will lose? Who will get stabbed by something sharp and pointy? It's the stunning conclusion of Zeb Wells' and Joe Mad's epic tale of ninjas
*BATTLE OF THE ATOM PART 4! The Uncanny X-Men enter the crossover. Whose side will they be on?*
*Wolverine and Gambit "on the road" in a stolen Lamborghini...With an alien stuffed in the teeny tiny trunk - and more aliens tailing them. What could possibly go wrong?*
*Wolverine takes a road trip into the valley of death with Kitty Pryde! But there's a hefty bounty on Logan's head
*url*: and every villain and mercenary is popping out of the woodwork to try to take him down. First up: Batroc the Leaper!*

*description*: *"The Good
*thumbnail*:
 Part 1 of 5. Deadpool's past in the Weapon X program comes back to haunt him...so he calls in help from WOLVERINE & CAPTAIN AMERICA!*,*http://marvel.com/comics/issue/46051/deadpool_2012_15?utm_campaign=apiRef&utm_source=818dad62b16c153f47f723d32982e787*,*http://i.annihil.us/u/prod/marvel/i/mg/3/a0/5212669b4d5d7.jpg*,*2013*
*43523*,*New Avengers (2013) #9*,*CULL OBSIDIAN." The Illuminati on the front line as the Earth is invaded. The House of Black Bolt cracks. Earth falls.*

*description*: *In the aftermath of Iceman's assault on the world
*url*: the X-Men need some time to breathe and reflect
*thumbnail*: and take stock of their relationships. What will come from this? And will it send one character down a new path away from the X-Men?*

*description*: *After the game-changing events of PRIMER
*url*: the women of the X-Men must contemplate the future of their makeshift team. Are the X-women ready for the BATTLE OF THE ATOM that's right around the corner? Meanwhile: Jubilee may still look like a kid
*thumbnail*: but she finds herself burdened with some very adult responsibilities. What kind of plans can a mutant vampire teen mom make for her own future?*

*description*: *David Haller has reshaped his life in response to his father's legacy - but what about his mother's? David returns to Muir Island to meet with Gabrielle Haller and sort out their complicated relationship once and for all! How will this visit affect the monsters that haunt David's mind? Should some old memories remain buried?*
*PART ONE OF KILLABLE! It all starts here
*url*: the biggest Wolverine event in years! Wolverine thinks a cure has been found?but it's in Wakanda
*thumbnail*: where he's not exactly a welcome guest! Meanwhile
*year*: Nick Fury and S.H.I.E.L.D. are working on even bigger problems that Wolverine might have caused. Guest-starring Storm and Black Panther!*

*description*: *As the world shivers beneath a heavy blanket of snow
*url*: it's time for the final showdown...Iceman vs. Iceman! When all is said and done
*thumbnail*: who is Bobby Drake? What kind of man will he be? And how can he reconcile the things that he's done?*

*description*: *Reality star Chris Cosentino tells a tale about Wolverine and food like only a Top Chef Master can! Adamantium claws meet steel kitchen knives in a culinary caper staring your favorite costumed Canadian!*
*Superstar artist Carlo Barberi's first arc on Scarlet Spider might be Kaine's last as the Red Death comes for everyone. Has Kaine made a deal with the devil? No
*url*: not Mephisto. More Scarlet Spider and Wolverine action than you can shake an adamantium claw or spider stinger at.*

*description*: *After the events of Wolverine #6
*url*: Logan must adjust to a very different kind of life. How will his friends and rivals respond to his new status quo? Guest-starring Storm and Beast!*

*description*: *Wolverine slices! Elektra dices! What more could you want in a comic?*
*The apocalypse has arrived...and it's made of ice. A catastrophic storm has buried much of the northern hemisphere under the deadly weight of snow
*url*: creating a kingdom where only one man rules: Bobby Drake. But Bobby's mind has become fragmented and lost. Who will stop his reign of terror?*

*description*: *Wolverine fights to save Nick Fury and escape from the helicarrier - while trapped on the ocean floor! And at the end
*url*: Wolverine's world is changed forever! We're not kidding - this is an issue you DEFINITELY don't want to miss!*

*description*: *Drowning Logan"" starts here! SHIELD agents everywhere
*url*: but not a comrade in sight! Wolverine finds himself trapped on a helicarrier - and it's plunging into the depths of the Atlantic Ocean!*

*description*: *"WRATH" PART TWO of THREE. Kaine and Logan... best friends? Or deadliest enemies? Find out as a thousand assassins descend upon them. What are the world's greatest killers afraid of? Who is the Red Death? Chris Yost and Carlo Barberi continue the Scarlet Sentinel's journey!*
*Ragnarok Now continues! A team divided. The Apocalypse Twins triumphant. Wolverine discovers The Midnight City and soon wishes he hadn't. The Horsemen of Death shatter the Avengers body and soul!*
*SPIDER-WOMAN & KITTY PRYDE (with Lockheed in tow
*url*: of course) investigate some unfinished alien business! Adam Warren returns to Marvel with an amazing short story so chock full of awesome that we can't even attempt to sum it up in one sentence!*

*description*: *Guest starring the Uncanny Avengers! Hope goes on the run
*url*: determined to help Cable whether he wants it or not...but the Uncanny Avengers have been keeping tabs on Hope and they're not about to let her get tangled up with Cable's band of fugitives!*

*description*: *To shut down the anti-mutant science cult known as ""Darwyn's Martyrs
*url*: Legion is on the verge of making a tremendous sacrifice: forfeiting his mutant powers! Little does he know
column7: is rushing to his aid?and she's recruited her own ragtag team of X-Men to help her! And another thing Legion may not know? The mastermind behind Darwyn's Martyrs may just be the villain in possession of his deceased father's brain?(If you're reading this
column8: Legion: Watch out! It's THE RED SKULL!)*

*description*: *The conclusion of Hunting Season! New York City is under biological attack. Can Wolverine save it before it's too late? Guest starring Nick Fury!*
*Over the course of his life
*year*: has taken on and beaten the worst enemies the world -- and the universe -- can throw at him. But is the most dangerous villain yet to come? And could it be none other than...Bobby himself?*

*description*: *THE ENEMY WITHIN: PART 2 OF 5. Who wants YOU for dinner? The Brood! Spider Woman & Captain Marvel declare war on the Magnetron! (Who?) Hawkeye has a bright idea!*
*A NEW ARC STARTS HERE! (WOLVERINE + ELEKTRA + SPIDER-MAN) x (WELLS + MADUREIRA) - RULES = PAIN.*

*url*: the secrets of the Forbidden Island stand revealed!*

*description*: *Chris Yost
*url*: Kaine and the Scarlet Spider family welcome superstar artist CARLO BARBERI to the book -- and it's just in time for SCARLET SPIDER vs. WOLVERINE! Kaine owes a favor to the Assassins Guild... one murder. And guess who they want dead? Hint: SNIKT! Guest starring the faculty and students of the Jean Grey School

*description*: *Guest-starring Nick Fury
*url*: Agent of S.H.I.E.L.D.! How will Logan take down a foe with no permanent body to slash and claw? And what does the Watcher have to do with all of this?*

*description*: *The Aftermath of X-Termination! Iceman is changed after his multi-dimensional ordeal. What aftershocks will this have in his life? What is left of the Astonishing X-Men
*url*: The X-Treme X-Men and the Age of Apocalypse?*

*description*: *Ragnarok Now part 2! Xavier is dead
*url*: now begins the age of The Apocalypse Twins! Now begins Ragnarok and it's all Thor's fault! S.W.O.R.D. Peak station is attacked by Apocalypse's Ship! A Celestial's fate so shocking
*year*: it will rock the Marvel Universe to its core. This is it
column7: Ragnarok is now and not even the Uncanny Avengers can hold it back!*

*description*: *Enter The Apocalypse Twins! The beginning of the end begins with their arrival! Why do they seek to anger The Celestials? What is their connection to Kang? How is Thor responsible for their mighty power?! A death at the hands of an Avenger divides the team! Will Sunfire torture an S-Man to save mutant lives?*
*X-TERMINATION EVENT PART 6 - THE CONCLUSION! To stop the Extermination
*url*: Jean takes the Apocalypse power into herself - but can she control it? The final reckoning for AOA Nightcrawler?and the entire AOA itself!*

*description*: *Legion and Blindfold go on a date?on the moon! But when Legion reveals his ulterior motive for visiting the moon
*url*: will Blindfold leave him without a goodnight kiss??*

*description*: *Part 5 OF X-TERMINATION! The Extermination are poised to devour both the AOA and our Earth! A final goodbye between Wolverine and AOA Jean Grey!*
*Enter: MAN-THING! The Savage Land holds many secrets
*url*: among them what could be the key to resurrection?but at what cost?*

*description*: *Wolverine and the Invisible Woman find themselves in the Avengers' past!*
*HUNTING SEASON
*url*: PART 2! Wolverine has to track down a boy on a rampage before he does the unthinkable!*

*description*: *PART 2 of X-TERMINATION EVENT! With Nightcrawler wreaking havoc on the very fabric of reality
*url*: Wolverine calls in his street team. Confronted with the doppelganger of their dead friend
*thumbnail*: will the team be able to do what's necessary to stop him? Wolverine versus Wolverine!?*

*description*: *Kieron Gillen's worlds collide as Loki and Mr. Sinister team up. You didn't think the heroes would have all the fun
*url*: did you? PLUS: Captain Marvel teams up with Wolverine!*

*description*: *Wonder Man
*url*: Wasp and Sunfire join the team just in time for Grim Reaper's revenge! Tension between the team builds as Havok's leadership is questioned! The death of a major character at the hands of an Avenger in broad daylight!*

*description*: *Shanna and Wolverine are separated
*url*: and Shanna teams up with...Amadeus Cho? Secrets about the island are revealed
*thumbnail*: but only bring up more questions. And

*url*: AGE OF APOCALYPSE and X-TREME X-MEN
*thumbnail*: and spinning out of the pages of UNCANNY X-FORCE. AOA Nightcrawler just wants to get home...and he doesn't care if he takes out our world to get there. Wolverine versus Nightcrawler!*

*description*: *A new arc begins! Great jumping on point! Cable's team loses a member as Colossus goes to jail.*
*Refusing Wolverine's offer to join the X-Men
*url*: David Haller must now decide exactly how he will carry out his father's legacy. But upon venturing into the world on his own
*thumbnail*: will he be beaconed back to Westchester by his budding fascination with young X-Man Blindfold? And more importantly: How will their future together change the fate of mutantkind?*

*description*: *IT'S HUNTING SEASON! The best there is at what he does gets an all-new on-going! Pay attention very closely: there's a mystery here that even Wolverine hasn't sniffed out yet. When Wolverine finds himself the bargaining chip in a hostage situation
*url*: he must make a decision to save a little boy that will follow him forever...literally! How can a berserker fight what he can't see? And how far will he go to assert his humanity in the face of the Unknown? Find out when superstars Paul Cornell (CAPTAIN BRITAIN AND MI:13
column9: UNCANNY X-MEN) take on the Wolverine!*

*description*: *X-FORCE is officially on the run. Cable must face his daughter Hope
*url*: the savior of AVX. The Uncanny Avengers are hot on their trail!*

*description*: *Red Skull and his S-Men move forward their take over of New York. A member of the Uncanny Avengers joins the S-Men! When the chips are down
*thumbnail*: one Avenger must rise and face the terrible might of The Omega Skull!*

*description*: *Gambit's hot on the heels of the lady thief who first crossed his path in issue #1! But what secret is she hiding that may just spell doom for our hero? And how will he manage to steal her away from the horde of super villains she's surrounded herself with?*

*url*: Northstar and Kyle face a threat at home...while Northstar faces another threat all on his own! And deep in space

*description*: *The groundbreaking first arc of X-MEN: LEGACY ends here! Discovering a plot to assassinate one of the X-Men that he inadvertently put into motion
*url*: Legion infiltrates the Jean Grey School for Higher Learning...but after their last run-in
*thumbnail*: will the X-Men accept his help? Meanwhile
*year*: Legion learns that the demon lurking in the depths of his psyche has a familiar face...*

*description*: *Wolverine and Shanna venture into the depths of the Forbidden Island...but what will get them first
*url*: the Island's inhabitants or their tempers? Another hero crash lands on the island...but is he friend or foe?*

*description*: *Storm and Black Panther's first post-AVX encounter! Your other two favorite characters fight your favorite villain.*

*Red Skull is using his new powers to incite violence against mutants across the globe! Scarlet Witch and Rogue make a terrible discovery that will haunt them forever! The Uncanny Avengers feel the full might of Red Skull's S-Men!*
*Warbird is on the run
*url*: labeled an enemy of Earth as well as of the Shi'ar! The X-Men must choose whether to help her or bring her in. What's the secret of the alien artifact she's uncovered?*

*description*: *Wolverine awakens to find himself in the Savage Land and labeled public enemy number one! With no memory of how he got there and Shanna the She-Devil his only ally
*url*: Logan must unravel the mystery of the Savage Land before it kills him!*

*description*: *The Illuminati gather to plan for the death of everything. Infinity gems
*year*: agendas and universal incursions are all on the agenda!*

*description*: *The action-packed
*url*: continuity-rocking mini-series comes to an end! Why do Wolverine and Sabretooth hate each other? Find out here!*

*description*: *What has Colossus been up to post-AVX? What is wrong with his powers? And why are Cable and his team attacking a civilian company?*
*To prevent a collision of universes
*url*: the Illuminati must assemble NOW! Led by the Black Panther
*thumbnail*: the most powerful and brilliant team in the Marvel Universe is up against an infinite legion of parallel realities!*

*description*: *FINAL EXTINCTION CONCLUDES AND SO DOES UNCANNY X-FORCE! Rick Remender's landmark run comes to a conclusion with one of the most shocking moments in X-Force history. What will become of what's left of X-Force?*
*Warbird takes Manhattan! What secret is she hiding
*url*: and will it endanger the team?*

*description*: *In order to save the Dreaming Maiden
*url*: Wolverine must face nightmares while asleep and while awake! But is the Dreaming Maiden too dangerous to be saved? And what will be the fate of the mysterious Covenant?*

*description*: *Professor X's five original students have been flung from the past to present day. While they cope with an unimaginable future (especially considering the fallout of AVX)
*url*: how will today's X-Men justify their actions to their past selves?*

*url*: The Living Propaganda! Rogue and Scarlet Witch vs. Red Skull's S-Men! Wolverine and Cap find the truth behind worldwide mutant murder!*

*description*: *The end of Spider-Man's world begins when Doctor Octopus discovers who Peter Parker really is.*

*url*: but is he friend or foe? Will Kyle and Northstar survive their first married mission?*

*url*: can Wolverine keep the Dreaming Maiden alive
*thumbnail*: or will Elsa betray him? Meanwhile
*year*: Melita makes a discovery that will change Wolverine - and her - forever!*

*description*: *Genesis faces the truth about Apocalypse and his destiny!*

*url*: but does this modern world really need them? A giant shift is on the horizon as the Avengers come to terms with themselves as a team and a family. Plus: Hydra with alien tech? Uh oh!*

*description*: *FINAL EXECUTION races to its thrilling conclusion! X-Force brings the attack to the Brotherhood
*url*: but there is dissension in the ranks.*

*description*: *The second year of the school begins - for some! The Jean Grey School for Higher Learning is in shambles
*url*: with teachers quitting and students at death's door - but what does the Hellfire Club have planned?*

*description*: *Spinning directly out of AVX! This issue: Wolverine teams up with the Hulk
*url*: and Captain America meets up with Cable!*

*description*: *The Avengers follow the signal trail to one of the greatest unsolved mysteries in Avengers history!*
*It's Wolverine vs. Murderous Lion in a no-holds barred Kung-Fu throw down! Also
*url*: Melita uncovers the secrets of the Covenant. Who is the Dreaming Maiden and why does the mysterious Covenant want her dead?*

*description*: *Meet Virus
*url*: the most fearsome new X-Villain! Also
*thumbnail*: Namor is recruited to be part of the First X-Men!*

*description*: *The First Appearance of the Uncanny Avengers
*url*: a.k.a. the Avengers Unity Squad.  An all-new
*thumbnail*: all-different team of Avengers assemble from the ashes of AVX! Captain America begins his quest to create an Avengers unit comprised of Avengers and X-Men working together - so why is Professor X's dream more at risk than ever?*

*description*: *As the world burns
*url*: the Jean Grey School tries to continue on. And admist the danger
*thumbnail*: one student ends up at the barrel of a gun.*

*The Hellfire Club is on the run from Cyclops and rest of the Phoenix Five. How does an anti-mutant organization operate in a mutant-run world?*

*Sabretooth is back! Where has Sabretooth been and whose side is he on this time? The identity of the red-headed woman who came to Wolverine's rescue is revealed!*
*Hulk vs. Wolverine! Hulk vs. Thing! The conclusion of STAY ANGRY! What devious plan has Banner been up to?*
*AVX TIE-IN! Kid Gladiator goes after the Avengers single-handedly! The X-Men from Wolverine's school see the events of AVX firsthand and have a difficult choice to make.*

*Wolverine versus Dr. Rot for control of Wolverine's brain. Can Wolverine destroy the last vestiges of Weapon X's programming?*

*url*: Psylocke goes to the Jean Grey School for Higher Learning to visit an old friend

*description*: *Escaping Quentin's hold
*url*: Wolverine and Armor attempt to recover from their dealings within the construct. Despite their escape

*url*: but it's not a social call. What dangerous adventures await the X-Men in their old stomping grounds?*

*thumbnail*: and Amiko invade the secret cave headquarters of The Hand to save The Silver Samurai. The big finale of The Hand/Yakuza War! The puppetmaster is finally revealed. This ending will forever change the landscape for Wolverine in Japan.*

*url*: Wolverine's X-Men are joined in battle by Cyclops' Young X-Men recruits to disastrous results!*

*url*: can Moon Knight ever come back?!*

*url*: the war between The Hand and the Yakuza threatens all of Tokyo.*

*url*: *With the Avengers possessed by evil and a city under siege

*description*: *Wolverine and AOA Nightcrawler face a strange and deadly new foe in Otherworld. Plus
*url*: Fantomex's sentence is carried out and he is injected with an anti-reality serum. And Psylocke becomes Lady Briton!*

*url*: the X-Men are divided. Magneto has chosen to stay with Cyclops on Utopia. Gambit has chosen to follow Wolverine to Westchester. And now Rogue must decide who she is going to follow.*

*title*: *Wolverine and Jubilee: Curse of the Mutants (Trade Paperback)*

*url*: *Spider-Man and the Avengers must go on a brutal hunt to capture Cletus Kasaday before a small town in the American heartland falls under his mass-murdering spell!*

*description*: *Not everyone is thrilled that Marc Spector is using his alter ego Moon Knight as fodder for a television show

*Here are seven all-new stories that set the stage for everything coming your way in 2012 from the biggest names in the comics industry.*
*Journey to the stronghold of the world's newest

*The origin of Onslaught revealed! How is it that Professor X became host of this dangerous psychic entity? And how was Magneto involved in the transfer? All is explained through Wolverine's flashbacks
*Are the X-Men prepared for the unstoppable return of the Juggernaut?*
*Featuring Juggernaut! Will Professor X's step-brother be the mutant to defeat Onslaught?*
*Gambit and Jean infiltrate a top-secret government meeting in the Pentagon.*
*Wolverine continues to regress into an animal at the hands of Genesis. Professor Xavier uses his abilities in an ethically-unsound manner. Plus
*Wolverine
*url*: Apocalypse’s Horseman of Death? He may regain his Adamantium
*thumbnail*: but will Logan lose his mind? And what does the fruition of Genesis’ plan mean for the Dark Riders and Cyber? The return of feral Wolverine!

*year*: Storm steps up to take Marrow down.*

column7: and Detective Charlotte Jones must contend with the Gene Nation!*
